Material used.Description: Blood samples were collected from patients and genomic DNA was isolated.

Readout description.Result Description: The presence of the c.879A>G (p.R294W) variant was confirmed in the genomic DNA of a patient diagnosed with Li-Fraumeni Syndrome.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed by analyzing samples from three different patients diagnosed with Li-Fraumeni Syndrome.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: No positive control was used in this method

Basic negative control.Description: Healthy control DNA was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not applicable as the assay was qualitative.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: The absence of the c.879A>G (p.R294W) variant.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: The presence of the c.879A>G (p.R294W) variant.
